response.original_title: 実録!!ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 31
response.overview: The 31st installment of a popular series that introduces all 10 episodes of carefully selected horror videos that have been posted! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time as well, in "Hanjaku", it is a video shot when I was walking with my lover on the street at night. The place they visited is a tourist spot, and when they walk along the illuminated road, the camera records it as a truly fantastic landscape. However, in spite of the beautiful scenery, there were some truly incomprehensible things reflected.
response.title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 31
